content.en: Algorithmic microgrid optimization: Researchers are exploring how algorithms can improve the stability and performance of microgrid systems with hybrid energy storage. These algorithms are being used to implement various control strategies, such as virtual impedance-based load compensation, current reference generation, power extraction optimization, fast acting MPPT, power management control, energy flow optimization, energy storage control, power sharing optimization, active power management, power flow control, and more. By utilizing these algorithms, researchers aim to enhance the efficiency, reliability, and cost-effectiveness of renewable energy-based microgrids.
content.da: Algoritmisk mikrogrid-optimering: Forskere undersøger, hvordan algoritmer kan forbedre stabiliteten og ydeevnen af mikrogridsystemer med hybrid energilagring. Disse algoritmer bruges til at implementere forskellige kontrolstrategier, såsom virtual impedansbaseret belastningskompensation, generering af strømreferencer, optimering af kraftudtræk, hurtig MPPT, kraftstyringskontrol, optimering af energistrømme, energilagringskontrol, optimering af kraftdeling, aktiv kraftstyring, strømstyring og mere. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at forbedre effektiviteten, pålideligheden og omkostningseffektiviteten af mikrogrids baseret på vedvarende energi.
